title: Squanto: A Warrior's Tale

Squanto was sensational. He could sing. He could fight!
- I want my Squanto! Find him! - Yes, Sir George.

Squanto made them. They're extremely comfortable.

Whatever you believe, Squanto came to our country by ship.
It is the name of Squanto's god.
Squanto, tell us about Kissuulk.

Nakooma is the name of Squanto's bride.
Bride? You are married, Squanto?
We have no women, Squanto. We have devoted our lives to God.
Squanto, we are not a tribe.
Look at this map. Now, tell me, where do you think Squanto would hide?
You watched Squanto fight off a whole platoon of armed men.
You've learned my language far better than I've learned yours, Squanto.

Who are they, Squanto?

- They've come looking for Squanto. - Perhaps he belongs with the authorities.

Like Squanto, the one who got away!
without being certain of being able to replace him by Squanto.

Squanto!

Plymouth. Plymouth is a dangerous place for you, Squanto.

You must see Squanto safely to the ship and then return.
Squanto?
Oh. I must tell you something, Squanto.
No, Squanto. No.

Well, now, Squanto, you were spectacular this afternoon.
